goals__remit: Europecoin is a worldwide currency, that is borderless. However its run by a group, that is rooted in the pro European activism movement for a decentralized and collaborating humanity. Our cryptocurrency is run and shaped by this spirit and aims to make it easier and safer for the world, to deal with Europe and for Europe to deal with the world.
